description: Test cases for time slot selection and booking confirmation

test_cases.name: Display Booking Time Selection Screen
steps: Navigate to Booking screen after venue selection
test_cases.expected_result: Screen displays venue name, date, court info, and available time slots

test_cases.name: Default Time Slot Selected
test_cases.expected_result: 19:00-20:00 slot is pre-selected (matching proposed session time)

test_cases.name: Select Different Time Slot
steps: Click on a different time slot (e.g., '20:00 - 21:00')
test_cases.expected_result: Selected slot highlighted, summary updates to reflect new time

test_cases.name: Booking Summary Display
test_cases.expected_result: Summary shows: sport type, time, venue name, total price, per-person breakdown

test_cases.name: Total Price Calculation
test_cases.expected_result: Total price displays as $32 ($8 x 4 players)

test_cases.name: Split Payment Option Default
test_cases.expected_result: Split payment checkbox is checked by default

test_cases.name: Toggle Split Payment Off
test_cases.expected_result: Split payment disabled, full payment expected from host

test_cases.name: Confirm and Lock Booking
test_cases.expected_result: Booking confirmed, user navigated to Booking Confirmation screen

test_cases.name: Navigate Back to Venue Selection
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Venue Suggestions screen

test_cases.name: Unavailable Time Slot
test_cases.expected_result: Unavailable slots visually disabled or marked as booked
